tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states "We won’t track you or use any tracking service (third-party or not) to save/collect your information. We don’t have a logging policy which means even usual logs (such as IP addresses) won’t be saved on our end or on the cloud.".
tosdr.case: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible

title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
